an5.11:4.1: “I claim to have attained perfection and consummation of insight regarding principles not learned before from another.
an5.11:4.2: A Realized One has five powers of a Realized One. With these he claims the bull’s place, roars his lion’s roar in the assemblies, and turns the holy wheel.
an5.11:4.4: The powers of faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
an5.11:4.5: These are the five powers of a Realized One. With these he claims the bull’s place, roars his lion’s roar in the assemblies, and turns the holy wheel.”
